mapper.sql: id, series_code, models_code, models_name, guide_price, engine, seats, ctime
mapper.select:
select
from fss_car_models where series_code = #{seriesCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR} order by year desc
mapper.insert: insert into fss_car_models (id, series_code, models_code, models_name, guide_price, engine, seats, ctime) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{seriesCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{modelsCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{modelsName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{guidePrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{engine,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{seats,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{ctime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
